data.page_title: The Sutton Place Hotels in British Columbia and Alberta Canada.
data.footer_copyright_text: Sandman Hotel Group - All Rights Reserved
data.footer_static_content: Head Office - Sandman Hotel Group 310 – 1755 West Broadway, Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada V6J 4S5 | Reservations : 1-800-SANDMAN
data.home_page_title: SANDMAN HOTEL GROUPLOCATIONS ACROSS CANADA, THE UK, AND COMING SOON, THE USA
data.home_page_desc:
By choosing Sandman Hotel Group, we will provide you with the extra measure of quality, comfort, and personal convenience you are looking for. With over 45 Hotels, Resorts, Inns, and Suites from British Columbia to Quebec and the UK, and with several properties under development, Sandman is Canada’s fastest-growing, privately-owned hospitality company. A Canadian success story, we are continually refining our product and expanding our facilities – and definitely on the move!

In addition to great accommodations, you can enjoy a variety of dining options during your travels. Choose from a casual yet upscale dining experience at CHOP Steakhouse & Bar or a stylish, relaxed environment at Moxie’s Grill & Bar. Alternatively, you can choose the convenience of Denny’s Restaurants, Shark Club Sport | Bar | Grill, Rockford Wok|Bar|Grill, or get together with friends at one of our popular lounges.

At Sandman, we understand. For 50 years, we have made it our business to take care of the details to ensure your stay with us is enjoyable, comfortable, and affordable.
data.home_page_offer_one:
Great Offers

Take advantage of our great offers and promotions to make your stay even more enjoyable!
data.home_page_offer_two:
PERSONAL PROFILE

Look up your past stays and save your personal info for quicker bookings!
data.home_page_offer_three:
MOBILE APP

No matter where you’re going the Sandman App will give you the absolute best price. Guaranteed.

data.cvv_modal_desc: The CVV Number ('Card Verification Value') on your credit card or debit card is a 3 digit number on VISA®, MasterCard® and Discover® branded credit and debit cards. On your American Express® branded credit or debit card it is a 4 digit numeric code.
data.cvv_modal_subdesc: It is found on the signature strip on the back of the card for  VISA®, MasterCard® and Discover® branded credit and debit cards. and the 4 digits above the card number on the front of American Express® branded credit or debit card.

data.reservation_lookup_page_desc: You can look up a reservation you made by entering your email address and web booking code below. You can find your reservation number on the email you recieved when you make the booking.
